pages.text: Barley is a wheat-like crop that can be found in Plains.
Rye is a wheat-like crop that can be found in the Forest biome.
Wild Garlic can be found in the Plains biome, the garlic itself can be planted in farmland.
Mint is a crop which seeds can be purchased from a Tavern Keeper, found in the Tavern structure.
Ginger is found in the Taiga biome, and similar to Garlic, it can be planted to grow a Ginger crop.
Rose Hips can be found in Jungles and Sparse Jungles, the berry can be planted to grow a Rose Hips bush.
Elderberries are found in the Dark Forest biome, and their berries can be planted to grow an Elderberry Bush.
